text: Psalm 76
Praise to God for His Rescue of Israel
For the \add music\add* director, with stringed instruments.
A psalm of Asaph. A song.\f + \fr Ps 76 \ft The Hebrew Bible counts the superscription as the first verse of the psalm; the English verse number is reduced by one \f*
God \add is\add* known in Judah.
His name \add is\add* great in Israel.
His den\f + \fr 76:2 \ft Or “shelter”; but the image of the lion appears in view \f* has been in Salem,
his lair\f + \fr 76:2 \ft Or “refuge” \f* in Zion.
There he broke \add the\add* flames of \add the\add* bow,
\add the\add* shield and sword and battle. \qs Selah\qs*

Radiant\f + \fr 76:4 \ft A possible change in the Hebrew text yields, “You are feared, majestic …” a form found in vv. \xt 8 \ft (7), 13(12). This is possibly reflected in the reading of Theodotian \f* you \add are\add*, majestic,
from\f + \fr 76:4 \ft Or “more than” \f* \add the\add* mountains of prey.
\add The\add* stouthearted are plundered;
they sleep their sleep,
and all \add the\add* able men cannot ⸤use⸥\f + \fr 76:5 \ft Literally “find” \f* their hands.
At your rebuke, O God of Jacob,
both rider\f + \fr 76:6 \ft Hebrew “chariot,” that is, charioteer \f* and horse slumber.
⸤You, indeed, are to be feared⸥,\f + \fr 76:7 \ft Literally “You, feared you \fq are \ft ” \f*
and who can stand before you
when you \add are\add* angry? \f + \fr 76:7 \ft A slight change in the vocalization of the MT yields, “from the strength of your anger” \f*
From heaven you proclaimed judgment.
\add The\add* earth feared and was still
when God rose for justice,
to save all \add the\add* afflicted of \add the\add* land. \qs Selah\qs*
For the anger of humankind will praise you.
You will put on \add the\add* remnant of anger.\f + \fr 76:10 \ft Hebrew “angers” \f*
Make vows and fulfill them to Yahweh, your God;
let all surrounding him
bring tribute to the \add one to be\add* feared.\f + \fr 76:11 \ft Hebrew “to the fear” \f*
He cuts off \add the\add* spirit of leaders.
\add He is to be\add* feared by \add the\add* kings of \add the\add* earth.
